mapper.insert: insert into shoes(shoesname, color, contents, image, price, indate, bno, kno) values(#{shoesname}, #{color}, #{contents}, #{image}, #{price}, #{indate}, #{bno}, #{kno})
mapper.select: select s.sno, b.brand, k.kind, s.shoesname, s.color, s.image, s.price, s.sale, s.favorites from shoes as s inner join brand as b on s.bno = b.bno inner join kind as k on k.kno = s.kno
